items.title: Slotkin declines DOJ interview request in ‘illegal orders’ video case
items.description: Sen. Elissa Slotkin and other Democratic lawmakers filed a video last year reminding troops that they can ignore illegal orders.

items.title: Texas special election emboldens Democrats heading into federal midterms
items.description: Races in the Lone Star State are among those that will be key to determining which party controls the U.S. House.

items.title: Trump to launch TrumpRx.gov, branding his push to lower prescription prices
items.description: The president has argued his drug-pricing initiative ‘should win us the midterms.’ Experts say its impact could be positive but limited.

items.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles

items.title: Border czar Tom Homan says 700 ICE and CBP officers are leaving Minneapolis
items.description: The reduction of ICE officers in Minneapolis is a significant scaling back of Homeland Security’s presence and comes after two U.S. citizens were kill...
